Constructor Detail

PropertiesPanel

public PropertiesPanel()
A basic constructor for a PropertiesPanel object.

Method Detail

loadProperties

public void loadProperties()
Loads the Properties object associated with this panel into the panel's table so that it can be viewed and edited. This object is obtained through a PropertyChangeEvent that this panel listens to. Properties are listed in alphabetical order.

clear

public void clear()
Clears the table that is displayed by this PropertiesPanel

getCurrentSelection

public java.lang.Object getCurrentSelection()
Returns the object which is currently selected by the Designer. This is the object whose properties are being displayed by this PropertiesPanel.

Returns:

updateProperty

public void updateProperty(java.lang.String propName,
                           java.lang.String newValue)
Updates the given property in the Properties object and reloads it into the table so that it can be shown.

This method fires a PropertyChangeEvent containing the new property information with the intent that the Object whose properties are being displayed will be listening to this PropertiesPanel. That way, there is a two way communication between the panel and the Object whose properties it displays.

Parameters:
propName - The name of the property to be updated.
newValue - The new value of the property.
